teacher_info.introduction:
I attended a Linguistic University and graduated in Pedagogy &Linguistics. Now I plan to get my Master's degree in Education. I have experience in teaching Russian since my studying years, I teach Russian to groups of foreigners. My students are aged differently. Also, I teach individual classes to adults. I mainly focus on conversation and informal communication. I present the material according to the communicative need. I can explain materials in English or German. MY TEACHING METHODS. They are flexible and I can help students in many ways.  I will be for you everything. I'll correct your pronunciation and ask for your personal opinion about what we read. We can discuss what we will talk about lesson by lesson, so that it’s possible for me to prepare vocabulary and useful expressions for you. We will know the Russian culture and, of course, keep track of what we did during the previous class. 

PLEASE NOTICE that I take lessons seriously and expect the same in return. 

First time students! I would really appreciate, if you provide some information before our first session. What have you been studying lately? Do you know anything about Russian? What do you need help with? What are your goals and your favorite ways of learning? I’m glad to teach you! 

I offer you, Russian lovers, tutoring in following ways:
Russian for travellers/русский язык для путешествий
Conversational Russian/разговорный русский язык
Russian for your examinations/Экзамены по русскому языку
The Russian language & the russian culture/ Русский язык и русская культура
Russian for love♥, flirt♥, dating♥, relationship♥

Phrases that you better learn by heart before you will have my lessons:
1.	Прочти вслух!
2.	Повтори!/еще раз!
3.	Как сказать по-русски «……»?
4.	Как перевести......?
5.	Запомни!
6.	Следующее упражнение/предложение
7.	Дальше!/Поехали!
8.	Продолжай!
9.	Самостоятельно!
10.	Соотнеси!
11.	Расскажи про ……..!
12.  кто, что, где, когда, почему, зачем, какой, как, куда, сколько

Thank you!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I will patiently help you increase and diversify your vocabulary, and I will correct your pronunciation if needed. However, the lessons will be more of a relaxed style, and I will be more like your interlocutor rather than a strict teacher :)

Я помогу вам пополнить и обогатить ваш словарный запас через свои занятия, а также буду поправлять ваше произношение, если потребуется. Однако, уроки будут проходить достаточно расслабленно и непринужденно, а я буду вам больше собеседником, чем строгим учителем)
teacher_info.teaching_style:
The lessons will take place in an interactive form which means that I will expect you to speak Russian for extended periods of time. I might introduce some new vocabulary to you and push you to use it during our sessions. I will also use additional materials (music, video, visual material, etc.). However, I will also consider your suggestions and wishes, and if needed, I can help you with practicing other skills (writing skills, grammar).

Я предпочитаю интерактивную форму обучения, а это означает, что я буду ожидать, что вы сможете поддерживать длительные разговоры на русском. Я могу помочь вам выучить новые слова, и буду подталкивать вас к тому, чтобы вы их использовали в своей речи.

course_info.trial_description:

Во время пробного урока я постараюсь выявить ваши потребности и предложить вид урока, который подойдет вам больше всего. Пробный урок - это также возможность узнать друг друга получше:)

Только для взрослых студентов (16-50 лет)
Это общий курс русского языка для студентов всех уровней, которые хотели бы изучать русский язык систематично (например, изучать грамматику, улучшить навыки чтения и т.д.). Мы сосредоточимся на ваших самых слабых местах и постараемся улучшить их.

teacher_info.intro:
Hey, everyone. My name is Alexey, 23 y.o, I live in Veliky Novgorod and I’m also Russian. 
I’ve been learning languages for over half of a decade now. I know the whole process of learning them could be tricky and when I saw the opportunity to help other learners with English or Russian, I was up for it without the slightest hesitation. 

I spend a lot of time on books and movies. The coolest part of knowing languages: you don’t waste your time when you watch/read something in a foreign language, even if it’s Twilight :)
My other hobbies are sports, mostly Football and Basketball (btw is chess a sport?), history, music. I’d love to meet new people and have some good talks

teacher_info.intro:
Hello everyone! My name is Daria, I am a native Russian speaker from a Siberian city called Omsk.  Last year, I discovered a new hobby for myself, is language learning.  Currently, I am studying English, Ukraine, and German. 
I enjoy listening to music, traveling, doing sports, especially basketball. I am also highly interested in feminism and eco-activism. Currently, I am a volunteer in a local human-rights organization. I really enjoy sharing my experience with others as well as learning something new from the person I communicate with.

No matter what level of language proficiency you currently have, I can work with both beginners and higher levels. 

Я не профессиональный преподаватель, однако у меня есть опыт как самостоятельного изучения языков, так и вместе с учителями. И я знаю, что нужно чтобы уроки проходили легко и непринужденно. Не важно какой уровень владения языка у Вас сейчас есть, я могу работать с как с начинающим, так и с более высокими уровнями.
teacher_info.teaching_style:

I recommend using a variety of apps, including QUIZLET and Memrise 🧡

- Overview of our main textbooks, learning methods and study materials
- Identifying goals and reasons for learning a language
- Getting to know each other

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian (A2-C2)
pro_course_detail.description:
Spoken Russian language with a native speaker from the heart of Moscow

The lessons’ purpose IS NOT to teach you grammar or make you learn rules by heart, it is providing you with a safe space to practice the language and give a chance to speak it with minimal uneasiness, guilt or shame. I do my best to foster a kind, accepting, comfy atmosphere on my lessons

The student is free to choose the topic themselves, yet I will be most helpful talking about:
- Daily life 
- Family, friends, interests and hobbies
- Sightseeing and getting around town
- Humanities
- Learning languages
- Learning about other cultures and religions
- Food, drinks, preferences and tastes
- Cinema, music, TV and entertainment
- Teaching languages (English, Russian, Arabic)

С нетерпением жду начала наших занятий!)

pro_course_detail.title: General English (A0-B2)
pro_course_detail.description:
English lessons tailored to your interests and language learning goals. Generally the lesson structure is the following:
- 5 to 10 minutes homework checking
- 10-15 minutes conversation
- 20 to 30 minutes of language practice, exposure and learninf (new grammar practice, fluency-centered practice, vocabulary practice, listening/reading)
- 5 to 10 minutes note-checking (I leave commentaries and new words in a Google Doc made just for you so you could see what we’ve learned)

pro_course_detail.title: English for Humanitarian Studies
pro_course_detail.description:
I can help you learn English if you’re interested or majoring/minoring in:
- Psychology
- Philosophy
- Religious Studies (Christian, Islamic, Buddhist etc.)
- Oriental Studies (The Middle & Far East)
- Political Science
- Art
- History
- The basics of neuroscience, biology and cognitive psychology

The lessons will be structured around reading and listening tasks, as well as learning and practicing new grammar THROUGH new vocabulary. Most often we won’t cover specific grammar points like “today we are going to learn about Present Perfect” - we’ll try to have a look at ho different structures convey different meaning, and thus make rules by ourselves. I also enjoy making interactive activities, games and exercises based on your topics of interest

Looking forward to helping you learn English through what you love :3

teacher_info.intro:
Hello, my name is Karolina!
Before the war in Ukraine, I was a teacher at private schools, as well as an online tutor. Now, due to recent events, I give lessons exclusively online and I will be glad to our classes!
I am a 2nd-year Master's student in English and Ukrainian Philology, in addition, I am a 4th-year bachelor's student in artificial intelligence, where I study the possibilities of language analysis.
Now I teach Russian, Ukrainian, and English to children and adults. With effort, you will be able to speak the language you need with confidence and absolutely easily! I invite you to my classes!
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello, my name is Karolina!
Before the war in Ukraine, I was a teacher at private schools, as well as an online tutor. Now, due to recent events, I give lessons exclusively online and I will be glad to our classes!
I am a 2nd-year Master's student in English and Ukrainian Philology, in addition, I am a 4th-year bachelor's student in artificial intelligence, where I study the possibilities of language analysis.
Now I teach Russian, Ukrainian, and English to children and adults. With effort, you will be able to speak the language you need with confidence and absolutely easily! I invite you to my classes!
teacher_info.about_teacher: I am a person who always supports and understands, but also motivates you to do your homework, which is very important for the results. I will be very happy to study with you and I also love it when my students become my friends because my task as a teacher and this is scientifically confirmed, for example, by such a psychological phenomenon as the Pygmalion or Rosenthal effect, not only to teach but to give support and self-confidence, since positive expectations of the teacher for the student have greater results. And I always believe in my students!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
As a teacher, I support a communicative approach to language learning. The main focus of teaching is the practice of speaking and listening, but the basis of grammar is also very important, so these are 3 elements around which most of my lessons are built. Of course, we also practice reading and writing, as well as vocabulary, but it makes no sense if a person cannot understand or answer his interlocutor.
My lessons will be rich and interesting. Together we will be able to choose interesting videos, series, books, as well as textbooks that will become our friends in learning. We will act out role-playing situations, dialogues, use various auxiliary exercises, and tools that lead to our goal!

teacher_info.about_teacher: If you are interested in funny non-stress, but very productive Russian, Chinese or English lessons, feel free to contact me. I have an experience in studying many different foreign languages such as German, Chinese, English and currently Japanese. So I know how to learn a foreign language quickly and without big pressure. Besides, I have Master degree in Teaching Chinese to Speakers of Other Languages and TORFL teacher certification.
teacher_info.teaching_style: During teaching, I mostly focus on a speaking part, because I think, that the speaking is the most important of learning a foreign language. Speaking should come with the first grammar. You have to learn not just words, but phrases you can use directly in dialogue. Usually, students are good at reading and writing, but their speaking is always coming the last. Be ready not just listen to me, but talk with me, explain to me and enjoy our lesson. Please note that all general lessons last 55 minutes.

Maybe you will need a notebook and a pen, but this also depends on you. Welcome to my classes!

course_info.trial_description:
This is a trial lesson for those of you who want to know the system Italki. You will have a lesson which suits your interests. 
This lesson is extremely important, as it is in this lesson that teacher and student get to know one another and look to see whether they work well together. We will also discuss the students’ main goals and learning difficulties.

The free trial lesson lasts 30 minutes and consists of the following parts:
- Introductions and short dialogue;
- Selection of study materials (sent to the student electronically);
- Studying materials
- Homework.

pro_course_detail.title: ʕ ᵔᴥᵔ ʔ  SPEAKING RUSSIAN CLASS > Real-Time Corrections and Feedback >   all the time
pro_course_detail.description:
I work with complete beginners and advanced students.

What can do these classes for you?
- focus on speaking and maintaining the existing level and get fluency level
- no-pressure conversation
- any vocabulary/grammar/error correction will be written on a word document and sent to you at the end of the lesson
- you develop language skills through speaking in the foreign language
- you improve passive vocabulary and grammar, so you will understand more
- your passive vocabulary and grammar become active
- you improve your listening comprehension
- overcome the intermediate plateau from B level to C
- prepared topics for different levels

I believe that communication with me for some time will help you learn communication skills.
So you know all the rules of grammar, or most of them at any rate, but need someone native to practice with to achieve fluency? If so, a one to one conversation class based around the topic of your choice will be just the thing for you. A no-pressure conversation in the comfort of your own home, away from traditional classroom surroundings will stimulate your fluency and increase your confidence to speak in Russian.

300 + common topics from to advanced level speaking topics.

pro_course_detail.title: ٩(｡•́‿•̀｡)۶ GENERAL RUSSIAN (A1-C2) > Individual Structured Lessons > Feel Confident and Start Speaking
pro_course_detail.description:
GIFT AT THE END OF COURSE - A GOOD E-BOOK!
This course is designed for all students who want to improve their general Russian and would like to gain a skill of speaking Russian. We start to learn Russian from the very beginning. 
What can do these classes for you?
o you easily study Russian
o you receive all materials and homework
o individual structured lessons of the Russian language
o these classes interesting and fun
It`s a textbook-based course.
Going through a textbook, which fits your language level, we will read the text and do the exersises working on pronunciation, understanding, speaking and grammar during the one class. Textbooks are especially helpful for beginning. The material to be covered and the design of each lesson are carefully spelled out in detail. A textbook series provides you with a balanced, chronological presentation of information.

** List of text which I use in my lessons**
& Поехали (Poyekhali) A1-B1 (my favourite)
& Русский сувенир (Russkiy suvenir) A1,A2
& I love Russian A1 (It`s more complicated then Russkiy suvenir A1. Its good for hardwork students or refreshing level)
& Новый сувенир (Novyy suvenir) B1
& “В мире людей” В2-С1
& “Вперёд!” В2-С1
& C2 Уровень образованного носителя языка. Читайте книги в оригинале и смотрите фильмы!
→I send you a link to download a textbook.

** How much time does it take? **
It definitely depends on your style of learning.  On average levels: A1,A2, B1 takes 45 hours (2-3 pages per lesson) each level. 
I can give you a list of words for the next lesson. If you learn words before the next lesson and prepared for a class than a course takes less hours. How I said It`s up to you.

ОБЩИЙ КУРС АНГЛИЙСКОГО
Этот курс создан для начинающих и продолжающих, тех кто хочет повысить их языковые навыки: лексика, грамматика, аудирование, чтение, фонетика и кто хотел бы получить навыки разговорного английского. Мы начнем учить английский с самого начала.

Что может сделать этот курс для Вас?
✍ вы с легкостью будете учить английский

Учебники особенно полезны для начинающих. Серия учебников предоставляет вам сбалансированное, последовательное представление информации.

pro_course_detail.title: (((o(*°▽°*)o))) (A1-B2) >  English: Grammar + Vocabulary ツ |||  Английский: Грамматика и Словарный запас
pro_course_detail.description:
THESE LESSONS FOR YOU IF

✍ You have difficulty with grammar or the answer to the question: "why don't they understand me?" - Wrong word order in a sentence and you think "Why is everything different in this language?" *

✍ You think that "I'm going to learn all the grammar, then I will speak" - you will not speak.

✍ You think that studying from textbooks is boring and unnecessary, because in (substitute yours) you studied from textbooks (substitute yours) years, and you don’t know anything. 1) Hmm, you just didn't study with me; 2) my lessons 20% theory 80% of your practice.

* answer: not differently, just >Your way of thinking is different< from English way of thinking.

Эти УРОКИ ДЛЯ ВАС, ЕСЛИ 
✍ Вы испытываете трудности с грамматикой, где какой глагол или ответ на вопрос: "почему меня не понимают и делают круглые глаза?" - неправильный порядок слов в предложении и Вы думаете "Почему в этом языке всё по другому?"*

✍ Вы считаете, что "выучу всю грамматику, то заговорю" - нет, не заговорите. 

✍ Вы полагаете, что занятия по учебниках скушные и не нужные, ведь в (подставь своё) учились по учебниках (подставь своё)  лет, а я ни чего не знаю. 1) Хм, вы просто не занимались со мной; 2) мои уроки 20% теории 80% вашей практики.

*ответ: не по другому, просто >Ваш способ думать отличается< от английского мышления.

Эй, привет! Ты хочешь начать (продолжить) своё языковое путешествие, но всё ещё не уверен? Я предлагаю отличную цену, чтобы ты распробовал/-а мои уроки.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi! Привет!
My name is Lisa and I'm a native Russian speaker. I also speak English fluently and have recently started learning German and Spanish. So I definitely know all the struggles of learning foreign languages. That’s why I’m here to make learning fun and easy.

Меня зовут Лиза и я носитель русского языка.  Я также свободно говорю по-английски и недавно начала изучать немецкий и испанский. Так что я точно знаю все трудности изучения иностранных языков. Поэтому я здесь, чтобы помочь вам сделать обучение интересным и легким.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi! Привет!
My name is Lisa and I'm a native Russian speaker. I also speak English fluently and have recently started learning German and Spanish. So I definitely know all the struggles of learning foreign languages. That’s why I’m here to make learning fun and easy.

teacher_info.about_teacher: I have a casual and friendly approach as a teacher. I never want you to feel like you're back in school reading out of a textbook. I'm very supportive and patient. I know how difficult it is to learn a new language and I know that mistakes are a part of the process. I will always be your №1 cheerleader.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
In my opinion speaking practice is key to learning any language, so my lessons are CONVERSATION BASED. 
We will work on SPEAKING and CONVERSATION SKILLS. We will talk as much as possible, discuss various topics you are interested in, so that you can start speaking more fluently as fast as possible.

Some other things we can work on:
- pronunciation
- grammar
- learning new vocabulary
- listening comprehension 
- writing

P.S. I understand how uncomfortable and scary it might be to speak a foreign language, but DON'T WORRY, I'm here to help you with that fear too. I will be your cheerleader day and night.

course_info.trial_description:
During our trial session you will get acquainted with me and my teaching methods.   
We can simply talk and practice your speaking skills, learn some grammar and vocabulary or even play interesting and engaging games in Russian during this type of lesson!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Speaking practice/ Разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description:
This type of lesson is for those who want to get rid of the language barrier and start speaking Russian ASAP. The fastest way of learning any language is by having real-life conversations and that's what we are going to do!

PS. I understand how uncomfortable and scary it might be to speak a foreign language, but DON'T WORRY, I'm here to help you with that fear too. I will be your #1 cheerleader. We will discuss different topics, broaden your vocabulary and gradually make you used to daily conversations.

The lesson will be structured according to your needs and level, but the main goal will be set on speaking and enriching your vocabulary. BUT If there are any grammar or pronunciation questions we will work on that for sure! I will help you fix any mistakes.

After you book this lesson, I will text you to ask if you have any specific goals in mind and topics you want to be able to speak about, it can be
- russian for dating 
- russian for travelling
- learning russian idioms and how to use them during converstion 
- russian for daily communication 
Whatever your goals are, I will highly customize my lessons to YOUR needs.

Этот тип урока для тех, кто хочет избавиться от языкового барьера и быстро начать говорить по-русски. Самый быстрый способ сделать это - вести реальную беседу с носителем языка!
Вы будете много говорить, и я буду помогать вам пополнять словарный запас. Но если возникнут вопросы по грамматике, мы обязательно их обсудим! Ещё мы поработаем над произношением и навыками аудирования. Я помогу вам исправить ошибки.

После того, как вы забронируете урок, я напишу вам, чтобы спросить, есть ли у вас какие-то конкретные цели и темы, о которых вы хотите поговорить, это может быть
- русский для знакомств или путешествий
- изучение русских идиом и их использование в разговоре
- русский для повседневного общения
Какими бы ни были ваши цели, я приспособлю свои уроки к ВАШИМ потребностям.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners/ Русский для начинающих
pro_course_detail.description:
This type of lesson is suitable for those who have just started learning Russian and want to understand the basics. We will start from scratch! You will practice Russian pronunciation, learn basic grammar and will be able to speak on simple topics.

Этот тип урока подойдет для тех, кто только начал изучать русский язык и хочет понять основы. Мы начнем с нуля! Вы будете практиковать русское произношение, выучите основы грамматики и сможете говорить на простые темы.

pro_course_detail.description: Практика разговорного русского языка. Обсуждение различных тем, увеличение словарного запаса. Подойдет ученикам, которые ранее уже изучали язык и хотели бы улучшить разговорную речь

pro_course_detail.title: Русский для начинающих
pro_course_detail.description: Полноценное изучение языка, включающее в себя грамматику, разговорную речь, чтение, а также понимание языка на слух. Все материалы предоставляются преподавателем. Программа адаптируется под цели студента
